title: Successful user login with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in using a valid email and password combination and is redirected to the appropriate dashboard based on their role.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and password
Submit the login form
User is authenticated and redirected to dashboard
User interface displays options according to user role permissions

title: Login attempt with invalid password
description: Verify that login fails if the user enters an incorrect password and an appropriate error message is displayed.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and incorrect password
Submit the login form
Authentication is rejected with an error message about incorrect credentials

title: User authentication restrictions for deactivated accounts
description: Verify that users with deactivated accounts cannot log in and receive appropriate notification.

steps.description: Attempt login with credentials for a deactivated user
Access is denied and user sees a message indicating account deactivation

title: Client CRUD operations with DNI/RUC validation
description: Verify clients can be created, updated, retrieved, and deleted with validation enforcing unique DNI/RUC and required minimum fields.

steps.description: Create a client with valid and unique DNI/RUC and required data
Client record is successfully created in the system
Attempt to create a second client with the same DNI/RUC
System rejects creation due to duplicate DNI/RUC
Update client details with valid changes
Client details are updated correctly
Delete client record
Client record is removed from the system

title: Client advanced search functionality and timeline display
description: Verify that the advanced search filters return correct clients and timeline shows chronological interactions.

steps.description: Apply various search filters based on client attributes
Client list updates with matching results within 3 seconds
Select a client to view interaction timeline
Timeline displays client interactions in correct chronological order

title: Bulk import of 10,000 clients with validation
description: Verify that the system supports bulk import of up to 10,000 client records with validation of DNI/RUC uniqueness and mandatory fields.

steps.description: Initiate bulk import uploading 10,000 valid client data records
All valid clients are imported successfully
Include records with duplicate DNI/RUC and missing mandatory fields in import
Invalid records are rejected with proper error details

title: Project creation with blueprint upload and GPS coordinate integration
description: Verify users can create a real estate project with multiple blueprints and assign GPS coordinates, ensuring data is saved and accessible.

steps.description: Create new project entering required details
Upload one or more blueprint files
Assign GPS coordinates or upload overlay layers
Project is listed with all blueprints and coordinates correctly linked

title: Property and lot CRUD, filtering and bulk import
description: Verify properties and lots can be created, edited, filtered, and imported in batch with validations and state updates.

steps.description: Create a new property and add lots with valid data
Property and lots are displayed correctly
Apply advanced filters to property/lot list
Filter outputs correct matching results
Perform batch import of multiple lots including invalid entries
System successfully imports valid lots and rejects invalid with clear errors

title: Lot state updates and locking after reservation
description: Verify that lot state updates in real time, and lots are locked from further booking immediately upon reservation to avoid conflicts.

steps.description: Reserve a lot currently available
Lot state updates to reserved and no other reservation attempt succeeds on the same lot
Release or cancel reservation
Lot state reverts to available and becomes reservable again

title: Full sales flow from interaction to commission calculation
description: Verify that sales interactions can be logged, reservations created, confirmed as sale, payments tracked, and commissions calculated automatically.

steps.description: Log client interaction and create reservation for a property lot
Reservation is created and lot state updates accordingly
Convert reservation to sale and input payment details
Sale is recorded and payments tracked correctly
Commission is automatically calculated based on sale parameters

title: Multichannel campaign creation and template management
description: Verify that users can create marketing campaigns across WhatsApp, SMS, and Email channels, manage reusable templates, and configure automation rules.

steps.description: Create reusable message templates for different channels
Configure new campaign selecting channel, audience, and template
Campaign is saved and scheduled with correct parameters
Trigger campaign and monitor delivery and engagement
Messages are sent respecting configured rate limits and webhooks update metrics accurately

title: WhatsApp Chrome extension lead detection and quick creation
description: Verify that the Chrome extension detects phone numbers in WhatsApp Web chats and allows fast lead creation linked to that contact.

steps.description: Install and activate the Chrome extension
Open WhatsApp Web and view a chat with a phone number
Extension highlights detected numbers and provides option to create lead
Use lead creation prompt to add client data
Lead is created in CRM and linked to WhatsApp chat contact

title: WhatsApp bot automatic lead capture and response
description: Verify that the autonomous WhatsApp bot captures incoming leads automatically, creates synchronized CRM records, and responds within 5 seconds.

steps.description: Send an incoming message to the configured WhatsApp bot number
Bot processes message, creates lead in CRM if not existing
Bot sends an automated response back within 5 seconds

title: Role-based access control and permissions enforcement
description: Verify system enforces role based security rules immediately, hiding unauthorized UI elements and restricting data access via RLS.

steps.description: Assign a user a restrictive role with limited permissions
Log in as this user
UI hides unauthorized options and functionality
Attempt to access restricted data endpoints directly
Access is denied by RLS and API returns appropriate error

title: Dashboards and reports load performance and export
description: Verify dashboards and report pages load statistics and charts within 3 seconds and support exporting data in PDF and Excel formats.

steps.description: Navigate to dashboard and report sections
Data visualizations load and render within 3 seconds
Export reports to PDF and Excel
Exported files are correctly formatted and contain requested data

title: Notification delivery and synchronization
description: Verify push notifications are delivered within 10 seconds and notification read status is synchronized across devices and UI.

steps.description: Trigger a notification event for a logged-in user
Notification arrives on device/app within 10 seconds
User marks notification as read
Read status updates instantly on server and across all user interfaces

title: Calendar event creation and reminders with push notifications
description: Verify users can create calendar events and reminders with templates, receive notifications timely, and edit or cancel them.

steps.description: Create a new calendar event with all required fields
Event is saved and visible on calendar
Set a reminder with push notification enabled
Reminder notification arrives on time
Edit and cancel the event and reminder
Changes are saved and notifications are cancelled as expected

title: Google Drive integration for document upload, sync and management
description: Verify users can upload documents to Google Drive, sync folders and files, and view updated files in CRMâ€™s document module.

steps.description: Authenticate Google Drive integration
Upload a document through integration interface
Document appears in linked Google Drive folder
Trigger sync and refresh document list in CRM
Uploaded document is visible and accessible in CRM

title: System configurations and role management by administrators
description: Verify administrators can manage system configuration parameters, create and update roles and permissions, and perform audit checks.

steps.description: Log in as administrator
Create a new user role with specific permissions
Role is saved and listed among available roles
Modify existing system configuration parameters
Changes are saved successfully and apply on related modules
View audit logs of user and system activities
Logs display accurate and complete historic data

title: Performance validation of client searches and dashboard responses
description: Verify that all client searches and dashboard/map loads respond within 500ms to 3 seconds depending on complexity and data volume.

steps.description: Perform simple and complex client searches with large datasets
Search results return within expected time limits
Load dashboards and map visualizations
Dashboards load and display correctly within 3 seconds
